mapper.insert: insert into tb_validcode(email, validcode, validcode_expire, update_time) values(#{email}, #{validcode}, DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE validcode=VALUES(validcode), validcode_expire=VALUES(validcode_expire)
mapper.update: update tb_validcode set validcode_expire = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where email = #{email} and validcode = #{validcode}
mapper.select: select IF(validcode = #{validcode} and validcode_expire > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, true, false) from tb_validcode where email = #{email}
